Subject: Retaliation
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

(I don't know the names of many of your character's CODE, and I was hoping 
you'd attack with all of them, so sorry if this seems like I'm ganging up on 
one person)

Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Serpentor/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Unitron/Punch/Scattershot/Chaos/Minion:



Demon Wulf fired off another blast of optic lasers at Rage's neck.

--

Flesh Ripper fired with his rifle again at Rage.

--

Dark Claw threw another explosive ball of energy at Rage's side.

----

Punch saw the attacking robots, and activated the Alliance base's defense 
mechanisms, shields at full and autoguns blazing at random enemy targets.

----

Serpentor raised his plasma launcher, firing a blast off at Shockaract.

---

Unitron walked out of the Alliance base, two laser rifles appearing in his 
hands.  He pulled both triggers three times, a total of six bolts streaking 
out at Diskus' chest.

---

Nemesis Enforcer raised his rapid-firing laser rifle, firing off 15 bolts at 
Jetstorm's abdomen.

---

Scattershot fired off twenty-five rounds from his automatic rifle at 
Sharpedge's left arm.

------

Chaos drove up behind the Mafia, looking at the situation, seeing his 
teammates open fire on the attacking bots, not the defenders.

---

Minion drove up in his jeep mode, activating the twin laser cannons on the 
sides of his jeep mode, firing a blast from each, both large laser bolts 
going at Diskus' back.
